PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-00842024-02-02PPC, PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectLocally Engaged Staff Employment Regulations, 2024
PrecisLOCALLY ENGAGED STAFF EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS, 2024 in order to (1) update requirements around authority, appointments, temporary employment and termination of employment as they pertain to the hiring of Locally Engaged Staff in missions and military support units outside Canada; and (2) set new requirements for oversight and reporting.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0016 Publication Date: 2024-02-14
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: LOCALLY ENGAGED STAFF EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS, 2024 in order to (1) update requirements around authority, appointments, temporary employment and termination of employment as they pertain to the hiring of Locally Engaged Staff in missions and military support units outside Canada; and (2) set new requirements for oversight and reporting.
